About Us

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Praesent vel placerat dui.

Frequently Asked Questions

How Can I Contact The Release?

We spend most of our time on Twitter, send us a DM at TheReleaseNews.

Website Support

To report a technical issue regarding the website, please open an issue on GitHub with a summary of the problem.

Can I Contribute Articles to The Release?

Anyone can contribute, that's the beauty of Open Source. But first make sure you follow our contribution guide and Code of Conduct before submitting a contribution.
page.title: About Us
